name: Oubliette (itch) (connorrowe)
description:
Randomly generated dungeon with fun items and spells to play with!

Very still much in development.  Suggestions are appreciated! No audio sliders yet, sorry.

Controls

WASD - Move

LMB  - Shoot

Q - Drink potion

Space - Next dialogue

K - Seppuku

Alt+Enter / F11 - Toggle fullscreen
